instruction: Please provide a detailed analysis of Scope 3 emissions for our company and ensure that the data quality and quantity is thorough.
output: I have conducted a comprehensive analysis of our Scope 3 emissions and have found that the data quality and quantity is lacking. I have identified a reporting gap of 69%, which indicates that there is a significant amount of emissions that have not been disclosed. This presents a challenge for investors, as Scope 3 emissions are the most important types of emissions for our industry. I recommend that we work to improve the accuracy and completeness of our emissions reporting in order to ensure that we are providing investors with an accurate assessment of our GHG footprint.
